page.title: 12A Day in the Life of.....(2)
page.content: THE MOTHER OF SCHOOL CHILDREN I usually wake up between 7a.m. and 7.30m. After dressing,I wake up my daughter and sons and go downstairs to prepare breakfast.What a variety... From toast to cereals,to marmite sandwiches,something different for everyone.At 8 a.m. the eldest,Jason, leaves home to catch the bus to school. Then at 8.07a.m. the second,Robert, leaves to catch his bus.After these two departures,Nicholas,my third son helps to wash the breakfast pots.After we've inished it is time to make sure that Nick,Richard and Elizabeth are ready to make the journey to school,although Elizabeth isn't old enough yet.She likes making sure where her brothers are.This morning,Thursday,Elizabeth and I went to Ashbourne,as it was Market Day, and did some shopping.
